page.title: 13Community Groups,Stickney.
page.content: There are two buildings in Stickney where community groups meet.The buildings are the youth centre and village hall.Playgroup and toddlers group meet in the youth centre three times a week.Children under the age of 4 go there to play together.Youth club meets at the youth centre every week and this is for children over the age of eleven. Mothers club is held once a month,and this is where a group of mothers from Stickney join together to talk,and listen to people who come to speak about different topics.The womans institute is very smilar to mothers club.Brownies meet once a week at the youth centre.This is for children aged between 7 and 10 years.They play games,sing songs and work for badges.Many sporting activities are held in the new village hall.
